title: Trouble With Girls [ADULT]
description:
Spawned from the late eighties halcyon days in comics; this hilarious romp pokes fun unapologetically at EVERYONE and lives to tell about it. 

Meet Lester Girls, a action hero's action hero. Years before Austin Powers; Lester Girls laid waste to comic book entertainment and the James Bond/super hero stereotype with his uproarious adventures. Lester Girls wants a mundane life - Cs in school, dead-end job, plain wife - and more than anything else, a good night's sleep. It's not his fault that he can't go for a drive without terrorists launching missiles at him, or walk into one of his many mansions without a beautiful, talented, buxom woman reposing half-dressed on his bed. He's so dashing and capable he just can't shake the fame and fortune.

The Trouble With Girls was brainchild of two National Lampoon contributors creators Will Jacobs and Gerard Jones (The Comic Book Heroes)  and drawn by Tim Hamilton.

Pack includes:

Apache Dick 1-4
Classic Girls 1
Heavy Hitters Annual 1
Lester Girls - The Lizard's Trail 1-3
Lizard Lady 1-4
Trouble With Girls - Christmas Special 
Trouble With Girls - Night of the Lizard 1-4
Trouble With Girls Annual 1
Trouble With Girls v1 1-14
Trouble With Girls v2 1-23

This torrent comes with an ADULT rating due to nudity and scenes of a sexual nature.
